svg.content: <mxfile host="www.draw.io" modified="2019-10-22T15:17:37.927Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/77.0.3865.120 Safari/537.36" version="12.1.3" etag="dwl_2vxxgWIZt9EwhzZ1" type="device" pages="1"><diagram id="FbgwI01q_3iMZuzPqMi9"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 27px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 22px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 118px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: use BOB_RSA_PublicKey to verify Sign = BOB_DH_PublicKey

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Use RSA Private Key to sign DH Public Key and send to Alice

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Initial Diffie-Hellman, get BOB_DH_PublicKey and BOB_DH_PrivateKey

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 126px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: use BOB_DH_PublicKey to initial ALICE_DH_PublicKey and ALICE_DH_PrivateKey

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Use RSA Private Key to sign DH Public Key and send to Bob

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 127px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: use ALICE_RSA_PublicKey to verify Sign = ALICE_DH_PublicKey

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 126px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: use ALICE_DH_PublicKey and BOB_DH_PrivateKey to get ShareKey

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 126px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: use BOB_DH_PublicKey and ALICE_DH_PrivateKey to get ShareKey

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 361px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: From now on, Alice and Bob get same ShareKey, they use ShareKey to encrypt and decrypt data with AES algorithm

switch.text: From now on, Alice and Bob get same ShareKey, they use ShareKey to encrypt and decrypt data with AES algorithm
